alert.note: Alert for Rutland; Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 2:44PM EDT until July 12 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Rutland County in southern Vermont... Southwestern Windsor County in southern Vermont... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 244 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near West Pawlet, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Danby, Pawlet, Mount Holly, Mount Tabor, Weston, Tinmouth, Wallingford, Mt. Holly, Mt. Tabor, Wells, Andover, Shrewsbury, Plymouth, East Wallingford, North Pawlet, Belmont, East Wells, Russellville, Danby Four Corners and South Wallingford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
